text: Najibullah () is a male Muslim given name. Najibullah is a beautiful name with a rich history and meaning. It is a Muslim name that is commonly used in Afghanistan and other parts of the world. The name is made up of two words: Najib and Allah. Najib means "noble" or "distinguished," while Allah means "God" or "the Almighty." Therefore, Najibullah means "noble servant of God" or "distinguished worshipper of Allah." Najibullah can be: ==People== *Mohammad Najibullah (1947â€“1996), President of Afghanistan *Najeebullah Anjum (born 1955), Pakistani film and television actor *Najiballah Zarimi (born 1979), Afghan footballer *Najibullah (militant leader) (born ca. 1979), leader of Taliban splinter group Fidai Mahaz in Afghanistan *Najibullah Zazi (born 1985), Afghan imprisoned in the US for terrorist offenses *Najibullah Lafraie, Foreign Minister of Afghanistan between 1992 and 1996 *Najibullah Quraishi, Afghan journalist and film maker *Najibullah Zadran, Afghan international cricketer *Najib Ullah, Afghan writer (1914-1965) ==Places== *Kot Najeebullah, town in Pakistan ==References== Category:Given names
title: Najibullah
